solution: Research and development into the Sabatier process
text: The Sabatier reaction is developing method for converting carbon dioxide and hydrogen, with energy input, into methane and water [sabatier_reaction_overview]. A more affordable process could help reduce the use of natural gas in heating, cement [sabatier_app2] and other industry, and other terrestrial applications [sabatier_app3], and it may provide another energy storage option [sabatier_app1].
Further refinement on the International Space Station [sabatier_iss] or on Mars [sabatier_mars] will help the development of this process.
